messages.subject: Being a salesman
messages.msgSnippet: Hi all - I ve just listed three sets of menuki on Ebay in case any of you are craving a purchase. As an aside, somebody? at the SF show bought a very nice
messages.messageBody:
Hi all -

I've just listed three sets of menuki on Ebay in case any of you are craving a purchase. As an aside, "somebody?" at the SF show bought a very nice pair of menuki of "bow with arrows" from Jim Conrad. That particular pair--which I considered buying, but short of cash--is I believe, slightly larger than the "bow/arrows" set I have on Ebay. If so, my pair would make a neat pair to go with Jim's sold set. All three sets are nice but I consider the "kirin" the most interesting. Have a look...

http://tinyurl.com/mmu0
http://tinyurl.com/mmu7
http://tinyurl.com/mmua


Ron
STL

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
